instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2733: What is 820-2733? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: iMac <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2733</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message: Simply, does not wake from sleep. Must be hard reset. I have no idea at all with iMacs... Anyone please?

threads.title: iMac <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2733</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message: Could be anything. GPU is the most common issue on these. If it is anything else it is pretty hopeless. See if all hardware is present and working, camera/card reader/usb, etc. See if ASD picks up anything.
